files.description: Defines a single portable OUTPUT_DIR (from env var with safe default), helper functions to resolve/create output subdirectories, and path-joining utilities used across the project.

/determinism.py", "src/goal_33_toy_experiment.py", "src/metrics.py", "src/output_paths.py", "src/results_io.py", "src/results_schema.py", "src/run_artifacts.py", "src/run_pipeline.py", "src/toy_experiment.py"]
SUMMARY: Updated src/config.py to derive all output locations from a single portable OUTPUT_DIR (env-overridable) and ensured output subdirectories are created without any /outputs default.

missionDescription: Implement a single utility for output paths (e.g., `OUTPUT_DIR = Path(os.getenv('OUTPUT_DIR', './outputs'))`) used everywhere; ensure directories are created and all writers use this path (never `/outputs`).
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Prevents pipeline failure due to absolute `/outputs` paths (permission issues) and standardizes artifact persistence to repo-relative `./outputs/`, which is required for deterministic CI/local runs....
